title: The enjoy of Coding
text: Basic, C, Visual Basic, Java, Python, C# and either JavaScript: who cares: I enjoy code in every form.

title: User Design and Gaming Experience
text: User comes first and interactivity must be enjoyable: this is my vision of User Inteface.

title: The importance of beeing Honest
text: Clarity is the best way to build a maintainable application. Code must always tell the truth and coders must trust on it.
